item.title: Beginning with Jetpack Compose (Beta)
item.description: TL;DR Compose is a pretty great UI framework and you should try it out. However, it still has some teething pains in beta! I’ll be the first to admit that I’ve been pretty slow to adopt many of the libraries in Android’s first party Jetpack suite. Today, I want to talk about my initial thoughts with Jetpack Compose, Android’s new declaritve UI toolkit which went into Beta a few weeks ago.
